name: Ultimate Trainwreck
description: Ultimate Trainwreck is the more potent, more heavily sativa cousin of the hugely popular Trainwreck strain. Itâ€™s a great sativa that will send your brain into space and also packs a strong body buzz. Less active than the original, these dense, colorful flowers are not a good choice if mental clarity is desired. Ultimate Trainwreck buds have a skunky, earthy aroma with a sweet citrus punch.
